humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient has been diagnosed with invasive ductal breast carcinoma with no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes (pN0 (sn)). This indicates that the cancer has not spread to the regional lymph nodes. Therefore, based on the given rules and the report, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pN0 (sn)' notation in the report indicates that no cancer was found in the sentinel lymph nodes (sn) removed during the surgery. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
